description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 5 iterations of function f(x) = 8x + 5.
comments: n, 8*n+5, 64*n+45, 512*n+365, 4096*n+2925 and 32768*n+23405 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..19000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(8*n+5) and IsPrime(64*n+45) and IsPrime(512*n+365) and IsPrime(4096*n+2925) and IsPrime(32768*n+23405)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
